title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 441.2 - Supplemental application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 441.2 - Supplemental application requirements

State Regulations

In addition to the general application requirements
listed in section
440.7
of this Title, applications under this Part shall contain the following
additional information: (a) a project
site plan and a map which clearly shows the location of the proposed project
within the municipality; (b) photographs or images which show the current conditions of the project site as
directed by the office; (c) the
approval/endorsement of the governing body of the municipality in which the
project will be located if the municipality is not the project sponsor; and
(d) legislative authorization
for alienation if all or part of the park facility is being sold, leased, exchanged, donated, disposed of or used for other than public park
purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
441.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
